headline: Podcast: Tech Stocks Plummet Over Threat From New AI Tools
summary: Anthropic’s launch of new artificial-intelligence capabilities deals a blow to data-service providers. Plus: PayPal stock drops after the payments company warns that future earnings are likely to decline.

headline: Asian shares gained and gold and silver climb higher after a retreat on Wall St
summary: Asia shares traded mostly higher on Wednesday despite a retreat on Wall Street on selling of technology stocks, while gold and silver continued to regain ground after a recent sell-off. U.S. futures edged higher and oil prices advanced. The future for the S&P 500 edged up 0.2%, while that for the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.3%.

headline: PYPL Q4 Deep Dive: Leadership Shakeup and Branded Checkout Execution Challenges
summary: Digital payments platform PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025 as sales rose 3.7% year on year to $8.68 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.23 per share was 4.5% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: PayPal Names Enrique Lores CEO As Board Seeks Faster Turnaround
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) has appointed Enrique Lores as CEO, replacing Alex Chriss after a little over two years in the role. Lores, formerly CEO of HP Inc. and current PayPal board chair, was chosen following board concerns about the pace of execution and strategic challenges. The leadership change comes as PayPal faces weak earnings, missed growth targets in its branded checkout business, and rising competition from other digital wallets. For investors watching NasdaqGS:PYPL, this...

headline: Assessing HP (HPQ) Valuation After Sudden CEO Exit And Leadership Shake Up
summary: The sudden resignation of HP (HPQ) CEO Enrique Lores to lead PayPal, and the board’s move to install Bruce Broussard as interim chief executive, has pulled sharp market focus onto HP’s leadership and near term outlook. See our latest analysis for HP. HP’s leadership shake-up comes on top of a weaker share price backdrop, with a 30 day share price return of 14.10% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of 38.01% decline, hinting at fading momentum as investors reassess earnings...

headline: PayPal Leadership Shake-Up - Former HP Exec Hired As New CEO
summary: PayPal Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) shares are down during premarket trading on Tuesday following the announcement of a leadership change within the company. The stock’s decline comes as the company appointed Enrique Lores as its new President and CEO, effective Mar. 1. The Board of Directors expressed confidence that Lores will lead PayPal into its next chapter, but uncertainty often accompanies such changes.
